title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 448.7 - Discontinuance
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18 ยง 448.7 - Discontinuance

State Regulations

The operation of a group home may not be discontinued
except upon service of written notice to the department at least 90 days in
advance of the proposed discontinuance. Such notice must comply with the
requirements of section
476.2
(d) of this

Title. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 18
ยง
448.7

Amended

New

York State Register December 23, 2015/Volume XXXVII, Issue 51, eff. 12/23/2015

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
